name: RepeatBack
0:
”Alexa, open my wife and ask my wife what is for dinner.”
”Alexa, open my wife and tell my wife it's time to get up.”
”Alexa, open my wife and tell my wife Jane she is doing a great job.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my wife
des:
A novelty/humor skill developed during a training exercise to provide a husband some back up. 

This skill will repeat a required, provided message. The skill will optionally include the name of the person, if included. It will also convert a limited subset of 3rd person pronouns to 2nd person (currently only 'she' to 'you'). If only a name is provided, it will assume that is the message.

The phrases take the template of "ask my wife {name} {message}".

*Icon made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
